sentences.sContent: You must ink over your signature. Pencil writing is not allowed.
sentences.sContent_eng: You must ink over your signature. Pencil writing is not allowed.
sentences.sCn: 你必须把签名用墨水描一下。铅笔书写是不允许的。

sentences.sContent: As a concession to his reasonable demand, the doctor allowed him to work.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a concession to his reasonable demand, the doctor allowed him to work.
sentences.sCn: 医生向他的合理要求让步了， 允许他工作。

sentences.sContent: The children are allowed to watch TV after school.
sentences.sCn: 孩子们被允许在放学后看电视。

trans.tranOther: If someone is allowed to do something, it is all right for them to do it and they will not get into trouble
